entries.title: NYC mayor to visit border, seeks emergency aid for influx of asylum-seekers
entries.description: Mayor Eric Adams called on the state to provide more resources after New York saw another large arrival of asylum-seekers last week.

entries.title: WATCH:  What should happen with classified documents
entries.description: ABC News' political director Rick Klein explains the differences between former President Donald Trump's and President Joe Biden’s classified documents and why there’s a need for a special counsel.

entries.title: Holidays didn't lead to feared bump in flu cases, CDC says
entries.description: New U.S. government data suggests holiday gatherings didn’t spark surges in respiratory diseases

entries.title: World leaders unprepared for rise in cyberwarfare in the '90s, author says
entries.description: Matt Potter, the author of "We Are All Targets," spoke to ABC News Live about the rise in cyberwarfare.

entries.title: Philly's newly ID'd 'Boy in the Box' gets grave marker at 70
entries.description: The slain child was at the center of one of the city's oldest cold cases.

entries.title: Tory Lanez awaits sentencing as some in hip-hop come to terms with verdict
entries.description: As Tory Lanez awaits sentencing in the shooting of Megan Thee Stallion, some in the hip-hop community who attacked Megan appear to be coming to terms with the verdict.

entries.title: Robbie Knievel, daredevil son of Evel Knievel, dies at 60
entries.description: Robbie Knievel, an American stunt motorcycle performer and son of thrill-seeking father Evel Knievel, has died

entries.title: Winklevoss twins, Genesis target of SEC crypto crackdown
entries.description: The Securities and Exchange Commission went after two prominent companies in the crypto community on Thursday

entries.title: Tesla slashes car prices as much as 20%
entries.description: Tesla faces weakening demand amid heightened competition.

entries.title: Biden to deliver State of the Union address Feb. 7
entries.description: President Joe Biden accepted an invitation from Speaker Kevin McCarthy, the White House said Friday, to deliver a State of the Union address before Congress on Feb. 7.

entries.title: Treasury secretary says US to hit debt limit on Jan. 19
entries.description: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said Friday the U.S. would hit its debt limit on Jan. 19. House Republicans vowed to tie any debt ceiling increase with spending cuts.

entries.title: Nevada lithium mine gets $700M conditional loan from Energy
entries.description: An Australian company received the loan to pursue a proposed lithium project.

entries.title: DHS allowing noncitizens to report labor violations without jeopardizing status
entries.description: DHS allowing noncitizens to report labor violations with fear of immigration status

entries.title: Apple CEO Tim Cook to take more than 40% pay cut
entries.description: Apple CEO Tim Cook will take a more than 40% pay cut this year from a year earlier as the company adjusts how it calculates his compensation

entries.title: Clouded leopard missing from Dallas Zoo
entries.description: The Dallas Zoo has closed its doors Friday as it searches for a clouded leopard that appears to have escaped from its enclosure.

entries.title: Tesla cuts vehicle prices in bid to boost flagging demand
entries.description: With its stock price tumbling, Tesla slashed prices on several models.

entries.title: Mega Millions jackpot surges to $1.35 billion
entries.description: Mega Millions jackpot prize surges to $1.35 billion, the second-largest prize in the game's history.

entries.title: WATCH:  This dog mental stimulation hack is a game changer
entries.description: Finding ways to mentally stimulate your dog can be "ruff." Luckily all you need is a few snacks and towels for this brain game.

entries.title: Actor Kevin Spacey denies 7 more sex offense charges in UK
entries.description: Actor Kevin Spacey has pleaded innocent to seven further sex offenses in Britain, which bring the number of charges the Hollywood star faces in the U.K. to 12

entries.title: Trump Organization sentenced to maximum fine following tax fraud conviction
entries.description: Former President Donald Trump's namesake family real estate firm was sentenced Friday in New York.

entries.title: NATO planes to be sent to Romania to eye Russian activity
entries.description: NATO plans to deploy three surveillance planes to Romania next week to perform reconnaissance missions and to “monitor Russian military activity” within the military alliance’s territory

entries.title: Egg prices reach record highs amid avian flu outbreak
entries.description: An outbreak of avian flu and high demand led egg prices to peak in late December.

entries.title: Some GOP McCarthy holdouts scoff at claims Trump swayed speaker vote outcome
entries.description: Some Republicans who had held out against voting for Kevin McCarthy scoffed at claims that former President Donald Trump swayed the outcome of last week's speaker vote.

entries.title: 3 HBCUs receive funding in the aftermath of bomb threats
entries.description: The Biden administration announced more than half a million dollars in grants for three Historically Black Colleges and Universities that received bomb threats in 2022.

entries.title: 'Rust' shooting: District attorney to announce decision on charges this month
entries.description: The Santa Fe First Judicial District Attorney's Office confirmed to Albuquerque ABC affiliate KOAT that an announcement will be made by the end of January.

entries.title: Delphi double murder suspect to return to court
entries.description: Delphi, Indiana, double murder suspect Richard Allen is set to return to court on Friday morning.

entries.title: At least 7 dead as severe winds, tornadoes hammer US South
entries.description: A massive storm system whipping up severe winds and spawning tornadoes cut a path across the U.S. South, killing at least seven people in Georgia and Alabama, where a twister damaged buildings and tossed cars in the streets of historic downtown Selma

entries.title: Trump Organization to be sentenced for tax fraud, faces fine
entries.description: The stiffest penalty Donald Trump’s company could receive when it is sentenced Friday by a New York judge for helping its executives dodge taxes is a $1.6 million fine — not even enough to buy a Trump Tower apartment

entries.title: City National Bank to pay $31M in redlining settlement with DOJ
entries.description: The Justice Department announced a $31 million settlement with City National Bank over allegations that is engaged in "redlining" – a pattern of lending discrimination.

entries.title: 4-year-old missing after postal worker finds sister alone; caretaker arrested: Police
entries.description: Oklahoma police are searching for 4-year-old Athena Brownfield after a postal carrier found her sister wandering alone outside near their Oklahoma home, police said.
